rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Provides initial entry space with proper Vastu alignment for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjacent to the balcony, designed for social gatherings. West-facing windows ensure balanced sunlight as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample storage and ventilation. Placement is optimized based on local building norms and Vastu for auspicious cooking.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with seating area. Designed for harmonious dining experiences in line with Vastu.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: A quiet and serene library space dedicated to reading and work. Bookshelves are arranged in a Vastu-compliant manner.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: Modern studio bedroom on the ground floor with a spacious west-facing balcony. Aligned according to Vastu for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Balcony (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious west-facing balcony attached to the studio bedroom. Promotes natural light and ventilation as per Vastu.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring secure and Vastu-compliant entry.
West-facing window in the living area providing optimal daylight.
East-facing kitchen window for balanced light and ventilation.
North-facing window to maximize natural lighting in the study area.
Interior doorway connecting the living and dining areas, designed for easy flow of energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a west-facing balcony. Bedrooms are aligned according to Vastu principles for restful energy.

rooms.name: Balcony (First Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious balcony attached to the master bedroom, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom designed for privacy and comfort. Aligned with local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern en-suite bathroom attached to the guest bedroom, ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: West-facing window in the master bedroom to maximize natural light and energy balance.
Interior doorway connecting the guest bedroom with its en-suite bathroom.
